display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=v-tpNq5C8aUQ7kNvgGNr3vC&_nc_oc=AdjaR5RMSW4t8362VH7Xm5Tpyy-7KDHIQtG-31l_eFDGwWwZxUUBtaXxkOveXLWGaig&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=p2ZrlIOZGzpSQw_X-aKO1w&oh=00_AYFiLl6PsRWJv80A0NBNZDfAJEU-G_s44N1wDdLo7HIhGQ&oe=67DA5B9D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=7O8cN024eqEQ7kNvgEjmtte&_nc_oc=Adj938npJMxRuhYnederav4I9meCaHTFC_SjOmm8eUV6J1nUnKFsIY7nkZaHCmQjFaA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=p2ZrlIOZGzpSQw_X-aKO1w&oh=00_AYECQLPAMI_lQViIjGBGEwGJIlx-nQIV0WVgzfzUwj84EQ&oe=67DA3D52)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=sxgPz_nbyFQQ7kNvgFGQzsa&_nc_oc=AdhQLJEliec11zI-QYqQlXqaq6etnbf8kZ_MdN9T4DYZeSM550gO57Vgd65Kv_3X9_c&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=p2ZrlIOZGzpSQw_X-aKO1w&oh=00_AYGAy7uxyL8xEBPzqDIydD7fNbPy8U0Vcr8sis1kRs_Vxw&oe=67DA4363)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=9lQULOb3Yu8Q7kNvgHqvPgw&_nc_oc=AdjomMwVG0vzsK3-C4KgEnGn4NThP6W7qAgLE2IxE_lE3WhP3vFoXHmoYXM4Vq-Ogfo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=p2ZrlIOZGzpSQw_X-aKO1w&oh=00_AYH4-NogyfOGwFTQkRznKGN7xQoWsYyrTvw0L07niywPYQ&oe=67DA39EE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=1RcOmkl6P8AQ7kNvgHj28Jy&_nc_oc=AdiT3VwfmysxUlV9LPwc4cdzCHRIeRpiA2elgmfhM-P6jvjnY4cp5e9t77WCnc0q0fg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=p2ZrlIOZGzpSQw_X-aKO1w&oh=00_AYFtQyBoKAwAiTqBKSKFbjezrikQnvFQDkXjaQMHbUfuJg&oe=67DA41D6)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
